H0.text: Every 12 hours is the frequency at which high tides occur.

H1.text: Every 96 hours is the frequency with which high tides occur.

H2.text: Every 24 hours is the frequency at which high tides occur.

H3.text: Every 48 hours is how frequently high tides occur.

A4.text: Ocean tides are cyclic, rising and falling approximately twice a day.

A5.text: Tides are commonly semi-diurnal (two high waters and two low waters each day).
